summary: An ordinance providing for the establishing of the curb grades on Lawton Way, from a point six hundred and seventy-two (672) feet northwesterly of the intersection of the southwesterly margin of Lawton Way from its intersection with the west line of 15th Avenue West produced northerly across said Lawton Way, to the north line of West Halladay Street, on West Halladay Street, from Lawton Way to Thorndyke Avenue and on 20th Avenue West, at West Halladay Street.
